description.value: You focus your attention on a creature within 30 feet, overwhelming its senses. The creature must succeed at a @Check[will|against:exemplar] save against your class DC or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fascinated] by you until the start of your next turn. The condition ends if you use a hostile action against the target, but not if you use a hostile action against its allies.
